title: trindmon is op is what i got tould
body:
So I was just in a game and this guy playing {{champion:86}} was the one I had to kill and he sed I  was op as I was killing him at 30 min in 1 second. Now note he did not have a {{item:3075}} or {{item:3143}}  and that takes away all of my damage take that and I will not 2 hit you OK ok. 

Now get out there and learn to buy the right stuff as no champ is op.

replies.body: i cant help read everything you write in an accent

A fully built tank Garen is op: (and is almost unstoppable if your team actually works with you.)

5.5K hp
300+ both Armour types
q silences 2.5 secs
+200 hp regen after not being in combat for 8 seconds (+80 hp regen after 5 secs)

P.S. are you referring to Tryndamere?(if so his ult is a bit long)

It's 1.5 second silence.

The new warmogs is 3% of your max HP per second so if you have 3K HP that's 90 HP per second out of combat so it will take you 30 seconds to heal for 3 thousand HP.
Sorry I was thinking of cho'gath's silence I believe his is 2/2.5 seconds(I think)
